na ca anyam api kṣaṇam jñānam avagāhate
tadānīm tasya asattvāt
na tṛtīyaḥ niḥsvabhāva tā prasaṅgāt
na hi asau tadānīm tadīya anyadīyā vā iti

original: [ku.4.521] atītenāpi tenaiva kṣaṇenopalakṣitānuvartate iti cet- evaṃ tarhi vartamānārthatā prakāśasya (223) na syāt /
analyzed: atītena api tena eva kṣaṇena upalakṣitā anuvartate iti ced evam tarhi vartamāna artha tā prakāśasya na syāt
anyathā jñānasya api tathā anuvṛtteḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ
nahi vartamāna artha prakāśa sambandham antareṇa jñānasya anyā vartamāna avabhāsa tā nāma
artha nirapekṣa prakāśana anuvṛtti mātreṇa tathātve bhūta bhāvi viṣayasya api jñānasya tathābhāva prasaṅgāt

original: [ku.4.522] atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti sthūla eva vartamānaḥ prakāśenāśrīyate ityabhyupagamaḥ,
analyzed: atha mā bhūt ayam doṣaḥ iti sthūlaḥ eva vartamānaḥ prakāśena āśrīyate iti abhyupagamaḥ

original: tadā tajjñānasyāpi sa eva viṣaya iti tasyāpi na kṣaṇikatvamiti /
analyzed: tadā tad jñānasya api saḥ eva viṣayaḥ iti tasya api na kṣaṇika tvam iti
nanu jñānam aindriyakam ced
viṣaya sañcāraḥ na syāt
sañjāta sambandha tvāt
na ca jijñāsā niyamāt niyamaḥ
tasyāḥ saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt
tasya ca dharmi jñāna pūrvaka tvāt

original: dharmiṇaśca sannidhimātreṇa jñāne jijñāsāpekṣaṇe vā ubhayathāpyanavasthānāditi- tanna- jñātatāpakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt /
analyzed: dharmiṇaḥ ca sannidhi mātreṇa jñāne jijñāsā apekṣaṇe vā ubhayathā api anavasthānāt iti tat na jñāta tā pakṣe tulya tvāt
tasyāḥ api hi jñeya tve tad paramparā jñāna āpātāt
jijñāsā niyamasya ca tadvat anupapatteḥ
na ca indriya sambandha vicchedāt virāmaḥ iti yuktam ātma prākaṭya avyāpanāt
svabhāvataḥ eva kācid asau ajijñāsitā api jñāyate
na tu sarvā iti ced tulyam

original: prāgutpannajñātatāsmaraṇajanitajijñāsaḥ samunmīlitanayanaḥ sañjātajñānasamutpāditaprākaṭyaṃ jijñāsureva pratipadyate ityato nānavastheti cet-  #
analyzed: prāk utpanna jñāta tā smaraṇa janita jijñāsaḥ samunmīlita nayanaḥ sañjāta jñāna samutpādita prākaṭyam jijñāsuḥ eva pratipadyate iti atas na anavasthā iti ced
tulyam etat
tasya nirvikalpaka pūrvaka tvāt
nirvikalpaka gṛgītasya tāvat kāla anavasthānāt
tasya tena eva vināśāt
nā api kevala nirvikalpaka vedyam
tasya sa vikalpaka unneya tvena tad abhāve pramāṇa abhāvāt
na ca samavāya abhāvavat nirvikalpaka nirapekṣa savikalpaka gocara tvam
jñānasya iti sāmpratam tayoḥ viśeṣaṇa aṃśasya prāk grahaṇāt anumāna ādi vat tad upapatteḥ
prakṛte tu jñāna tva ādeḥ anupalabdheḥ agṛhīta viśeṣaṇāyāḥ ca buddheḥ viśeṣya anupasaṅkramāt katham evam syāt
na utpanna mātrasya eva bāhya viṣaya jñānasya ālocanāt

original: tatastatpuraḥsaraṃ prathamata eva tajjātīyasya jñānāntarasya vikalpanāt /
analyzed: tatas tad puraḥsaram prathamatas eva tad jātīyasya jñāna antarasya vikalpanāt
indriya sannikarṣasya tadā eva viśeṣaṇa grahaṇa lakṣaṇa sahakāri sampatteḥ
vyakti antara samavetam api hi sāmānyam gṛhītam tat eva iti upayujyate
anyathā anumāna ādi vikalpānām anutpāda prasaṅgaḥ
tad gatasya viśeṣaṇasya agrahaṇāt anya gatasya ca anupayogāt kim liṅga grahaṇa sahakāri syāt iti
etena śabda ādi pratyakṣam vyākhyātam iti
syāt etat
viṣaya nirūpyam hi jñānam iṣyate
na ca atīndriyasya paramāṇu ādeḥ manasā vedanam asti
na ca agṛhītasya viśeṣaṇa tvam
na ca nitya parokṣasya aparokṣa viśiṣṭa buddhi viṣaya tvam
vyāghātāt iti na
bāhya indriya grāhyasya a grāhyasya vā pūrva jñāna upanītasya eva manasā vedanāt
anyathā atīndriya smaraṇasya api anutpatti prasaṅgāt
iyān tu viśeṣaḥ tasmin sati tad balāt eva
asati tu tad janita vāsanā balāt
na ca evam sati smaraṇam etat
agṛhīta jñāna gocara tvāt

original: na ca viṣayāṃśe tattathā syāditi yuktam- avacchedakatayā prāgavasthāvadavabhāsanāt /
analyzed: na ca viṣaya aṃśe tat tathā syāt iti yuktam avacchedaka tayā prāk avasthā vat avabhāsanāt
na ca pratyabhijñānam api grahaṇa smaraṇa ākāram virodhāt
atha grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ kiyatī sāmagrī
adhikaḥ ūrtha sannikarṣaḥ grahaṇasya
saṃskāra mātram sannikarṣaḥ smaraṇasya
atha grahaṇa tve pi kutas etat aparokṣa ākāram
kāraṇa antara nirapekṣeṇa
sannikarṣavatā indriyeṇa janita tvāt
atha kaḥ sannikarṣaḥ
jñānena saṃyukta samavāyaḥ
tad arthena saṃyukta samaveta viśeṣaṇa tvam iti

original: manaso nirapekṣasya bahirvyāpāre 'ndhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅga iti cet- jñānāvacchedakaṃ prati nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
analyzed: manasaḥ nirapekṣasya bahis vyāpāre ndha badhira ādi abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti ced jñāna avacchedakam prati nā ayam doṣaḥ
na ca jñāna apekṣayā bahis iti asti
nā api tad viṣaya apekṣayā nirapekṣa tvam
tasya eva jñānasya apekṣaṇāt
atha api jñānam pratyakṣam iti atra kim pramāṇam
pratyakṣam eva
yat asūtrayat jñāna vikalpānām bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam iti
nanu na īśvara jñānam pramā
nitya tvena aphalatvāt
na api pramāṇam
akāraka tvāt

original: ata eva ca na tadaśrayaḥ pramāteti- ucyate- mitiḥ samyak paricchittistadvattā ca pramātṛtā /
analyzed: atas eva ca na tad āśrayaḥ pramātā iti ucyate mitiḥ samyak paricchittiḥ tadvat tā ca pramātṛ tā
tad ayoga vyavacchedaḥ pramāṇyam gautame mate
samīcīnaḥ hi anubhavaḥ pramā iti
tathāca anitya tvena viśeṣaṇam anarthakam
asiddhau ca vyavacchedya abhāvāt
na ca idam anumānam
āśraya asiddhi bādhayoḥ anyatara ākrānta tvāt
na tat pramā karaṇam iti tviṣyate eva
pramayā sambandha abhāvāt
tad āśrayasya tu pramātṛ tvam etat eva yat tad samavāyaḥ
kāraka tve sati iti tu viśeṣaṇam pūrvavat nirarthakam anusandheyam
yadi evam āpta prāmāṇyāt
iti sūtra virodhaḥ
tena hi īśvarasya prāmāṇyam pratipādyate

original: na tu pramātṛtvamiti cet- na- nimittasamāveśena vyavahārasamāveśāvirodhāt /
analyzed: na tu pramātṛ tvam iti ced na nimitta samāveśena vyavahāra samāveśa avirodhāt
pramā samavāyaḥ hi pramātṛ vyavahāra nimittam
pramayā tvayā ayoga vyavacchedena sambandhaḥ pramāṇa vyavahāra nimittam
tat ubhayam ca īśvare
atra api kāryayā iti viśeṣaṇam pūrvavat anarthakam ūhanīyam
syāt etat pramīyate nena iti pramāṇam
pramiṇoti iti pramātā iti kāraka śabda tvam anayoḥ

original: tathāca kathamakārakamartha iti cet- na- etasya vyutpattimātranimittatvāt /
analyzed: tathāca katham akārakam arthaḥ iti ced na etasya vyutpatti mātra nimitta tvāt
pravṛtti nimittam tu yathā upadarśitam eva
vyavasthāpanāt
anyathā asmat ādiṣu na pramātṛ vyavahāraḥ syāt
sarvatra svātantrya abhāvāt
karaṇa vyavahāraḥ tu anyatra yadi api anya nimittakaḥ pi
tathā api iha ukta nimitta vivakṣayā eva iti
evam tarhi pañcama pramāṇa abhyupagame
na hi tat pratyakṣam anumānam āgamaḥ vā
anindriya liṅga śabda karaṇa tvāt na sākṣātkāri pramāvat tayā pratyakṣa antarbhāvāt
indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tvasya ca laukika mātra viṣaya tvāt
syāt etat tathā api īśvara jñānam na pramā
viparyaya tvāt
yadā khalu etat asmat ādi vibhramān ālambate

original: tadaitasya viṣayamaspṛśato na jñānāvagāhanasambhava iti tadartho 'pyālambanamabhyupeyam /
analyzed: tadā etasya viṣayam a spṛśataḥ na jñāna avagāhana sambhavaḥ iti
tathā ca tat api viparyayaḥ
viparīta artha ālambana tvāt

original: tadanavagāhane vā asmadādervibhramān aviduṣastadupaśamāyopadeśānāmasarvajñapūrvakatvamiti na- vibhramasyāprāmāṇye 'pi tadviṣayasya tattvamullikhato  #
analyzed: tad anavagāhane vā asmad ādeḥ vibhramān aviduṣaḥ tad upaśamāya upadeśānām asarvajña pūrvaka tvam iti na vibhramasya aprāmāṇye tad viṣayasya tattvam ullikhataḥ
bhrānta tvāt
anyathā bhrānti samuccheda prasaṅgaḥ
pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: tathāpyāropitārthavacchinnajñānālambanatvena kathaṃ na bhrāntatvamiti cet- na- yad yatra nāsti tatra tasyāvagatiriti bhrāntyarthatvāt /
analyzed: tathā api āropita artha vacchinna jñāna ālambana tvena katham na bhrānta tvam iti ced na yat yatra na asti tatra tasya avagatiḥ iti bhrānti artha tvāt
ca evam ullakhataḥ sarvatra yathārtha tvāt
nahi na tat rajatam
na api tatra asat
na api tat na avagatam iti
bhūta artha anubhave
ri vastu kramaḥ
duṣṭi vigama prabhraṣṭa śaṅkā tuṣaḥ
śaṅkā unmeṣa kalaṅkibhiḥ kim aparaiḥ tat me pramāṇam śivaḥ
iti nyāyakusumāñjalau caturtha stabakaḥ
